title: Stop nerfing Katarina!
body:
Ok she is down now, there is no way you guys can nerf her without ruining her anymore. 
She is like Vayne now, horrible early game....monster late game.
This is the closest you guys have ever been to balancing her. Leave it that way. QQQQQ

Question: Katarina is permabanned in low elo? What division are you in and is she permabanned there?

replies.body: Katarina's been almost permabanned from Bronze to Diamond in my few weeks' experience smurfing.
I'm playing with Silver, Golds and she's always banned same with annie, j4, vi, riven, fiora, irelia, leblanc they are the most I've seen banned
